keyFeature1Desc:
No more wasting your time registering items one by one.
Upload it quickly and focus on more important tasks.
keyFeature1DescMobile:
Upload easily with registering only the necessary data.
Rely on BoxHero's helpful category recommendation.
keyFeature1SubDescMobile: BoxHero provides Excel import for faster item registration.
keyFeature1SubTitleMobile: Conveniently upload your inventory Excel to BoxHero
keyFeature2Desc:
Increase inventory accuracy with barcode scanning.
Connect your scanner or scan from BoxHero mobile app.
keyFeature2DescMobile:
Select item, insert quantity, and done!
Smartphone barcode scanner will save you time inventorying.
keyFeature2SubDescMobile: BoxHero supports barcode customization to suit your needs.
keyFeature3Desc:
No more complicated analysis.
Let BoxHero do the work for you.
keyFeature3SubDescMobile: BoxHero's easy, straightforward dashboard to know more about your inventory.
pageDescription: Stay on top of inventory management in real-time on your computer or mobile device.
pageTitle: BoxHero - The Simplest Inventory Management Solution
salesManagementDesc:
No more repetition.
BoxHero is all you need for managing order ➞ stock in ➞ sales ➞ stock out process seamlessly.
startNowDescription:

No quotation required. BoxHero is that easy to use.
